attributes.action: ensure that flouride is not to be added to drinking water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although Flouride may be beneficial for teeth, long term dosing of the poulation may well prove unhealthy.
It has been linked with cancer and immune system damage among other things. 
(More information can be found on the National pure water website www.npwa.freeserve.co.uk) The long term health implications of its use are not fully known.
Also the mass medication of any population (with no chance of opt-out) must surely be wrong.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
